message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
I think a fair 50/50 split is the best way to go. Let's not lose any money to inflation!
I'll take a bit more, it's better than losing to inflation
This offer ensures we both benefit, with a slight edge to you to acknowledge your earlier proposals. Let's settle this before inflation eats more of our potential gains!
Inflation is rising, I'll take a bigger share to compensate
Alice, let's be realistic. We're past the halfway point, and this offer still gives you a good advantage. Don't let greed make us both losers in the end.
